comments.body: _might_ be cleaner with `Record<string, string>` here, it will resolve to the same thing though...
Yes, it would look nicer but would also require TypeScript 2.1. Maybe we can stick with this for now?

TypeScript 2.1 have been out over two years now, I think it would be perfectly acceptable to have it as a minimum requirement.

Out of interest, do the tests run with TypeScript 2 and 3?
If we add the TypeScript 2.1 requirement then all modules referencing this module also needs to add the same requirement. I think that might be too much of a change right now.
